Desc.entry: A project which has had a successful lottery bid to install 50 outdoor basketball courts for the communities in the Sheffield Metropolitan area. Small grants for start-up basketball activities considered. Provides assistance with grant applications for awards for all funding in basketball. Also provides use of indoor portable basketball goals in primary schools linked to after school coaching sessions. Assists and supports 4v4 mixed mini basketball rallies, organised through Activity Sheffield and the Schools Sports Partnerships.
